name: ST. LOUIS CITY JUSTICE CENTER
sampleDescriptions: Assist the St. Louis City Justice Center with the re-negotiation of its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement to house federal prisoners.
Assist the St. Louis City Justice Center with the re-negotiation of its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement to house federal prisoners.
Assist the St. Louis City Justice Center with the re-negotiation of its USMS Intergovernmental Service Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
Assist the St. Louis City Justice Center with the re-negotiation of its USMS Intergovernmental Service Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
Assist St. Louis City Justice Center with issues related to its negotiation of its per diem rate with US Marshals Service for housing federal prisoners in its facility.
